head: fc6f098d15ae37eb6e973533dba2a9a6f702f8bd
title: Annex B.3.3 use cases have a universally-shared bullet with imprecise language

revs.author: Jeff Walden
revs.subject: Common up two requirements shared by all three Annex B.3.3 use cases, and use more precise language to specify an antecedent within one of the requirements.
